meanings.definition: A person who creates art, especially paintings or sculptures.
meanings.sent1: The artists painted a beautiful landscape.
meanings.sent2: Many artists gathered at the gallery for the exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The artists decided to have a paint-off to settle their dispute.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like a masterpiece painted by skilled artists.
meanings.sent5: The artists' studio was filled with colorful paints and sculptures.

meanings.definition: A person who is skilled at a particular task or occupation.
meanings.sent1: The cake artists created a stunning wedding cake.
meanings.sent2: The artists of negotiation were able to reach a compromise.
meanings.sent3: The artists of organization managed to declutter the entire office in a day.
meanings.sent4: Her ability to calm others in a crisis made her an artist of reassurance.
meanings.sent5: The artists of time management always finished their work ahead of schedule.
